step.datasource: insert into [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents (docid,dochid, ordernr, rowstatus, type, filename, runid,syscreated, sysmodified) -- selecteer factuur pdf van montage order met selectiecode 29 waarvan ook een montagebon is select distinct bd.id, bd.hid, ok.ordernr, 0 as status , 0 as type , bd.filename, '%RUNID%' as runid, current_timestamp as syscreated, current_timestamp as sysmodified from dbo.BacoDiscussions bd with (nolock) inner join dbo.orkrg ok with (nolock) on bd.OrderNumber = ok.ordernr where 1=1 and bd.Type = 14 -- factuur and bd.Warehouse = 4 and ok.selcode = '29' -- order selectiecode and bd.filename like '%.pdf' and ok.ordernr collate database_default not in (select ordernr from [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents) and exists (select a.id from [orlaco].dbo.Absences a where 1=1 and a.FreeTextField_09 = ok.ordernr and a.Type = 630 -- Montage verzoek and a.status = 4 -- Verwerkt )

insert into [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents (docid,dochid, ordernr, rowstatus, type, filename, runid,syscreated, sysmodified)
select -- Selecteer montagebon uit montageverzoek met status verwerkt met factuur van een order met selectiecode 29 at.id as docid , b.hid as dochid , LEFT(a.FreeTextField_09, 8) as ordernr , 0 as rowstatus , 1 as type, ISNULL(at.attachmentfilename, 'unknown') as filename , '%runid%' as runid , current_timestamp as syscreated , current_timestamp as sysmodified from [orlaco].dbo.Absences a inner join [orlaco].dbo.BacoDiscussions b WITH (NOLOCK) on a.DocumentID = b.ID and b.Type = 239 -- Document VIS: Montagebon inner join [orlaco].dbo.attachments at WITH (NOLOCK) on at.entity = b.ID where 1=1 and a.Type = 630 -- Montage verzoek and a.status = 4 -- Verwerkt and a.FreeTextField_09 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT in (select ordernr from [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents where rowstatus = 0 and type = 0) and a.FreeTextField_09 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT not in (select ordernr from [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents where rowstatus = 0 and type = 1)

select bEG.document binary_bodyEG, atESE.attachment binary_bodyESE , cast(af.dochid as varchar(30)) + '_' + af.filename as filenameEG , cast(am.dochid as varchar(30)) + '_' + am.filename as filenameESE , ISNULL(ok.inv_contactemail, 'ar@orlaco.nl') as email , af.ordernr from [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents am with (nolock) right outer join [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents af with (nolock) on am.type = 1 and af.type = 0 and am.ordernr = af.ordernr left outer join [orlaco].dbo.Attachments atESE with (nolock) on am.docid = atESE.id left outer join [100].dbo.bacodiscussions bEG with (nolock) on af.docid = bEG.id inner join [100].dbo.orkrg ok with (nolock) on ok.ordernr = af.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where 1=1 and af.rowstatus = 0 and af.type = 0 and af.runid = '%runid%'

update [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents set rowstatus = 1 from (select bEG.document binary_bodyEG, atESE.attachment binary_bodyESE , cast(af.dochid as varchar(30)) + '_' + af.filename as filenameEG , cast(am.dochid as varchar(30)) + '_' + am.filename as filenameESE , ISNULL(ok.inv_contactemail, 'ar@orlaco.nl') as email , af.ordernr from [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents am with (nolock) right outer join [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents af with (nolock) on am.type = 1 and af.type = 0 and am.ordernr = af.ordernr left outer join [orlaco].dbo.Attachments atESE with (nolock) on am.docid = atESE.id left outer join [100].dbo.bacodiscussions bEG with (nolock) on af.docid = bEG.id inner join [100].dbo.orkrg ok with (nolock) on ok.ordernr = af.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where 1=1 and af.rowstatus = 0 and af.type = 0 and af.runid = '%runid%') u inner join [ABEI].dbo._AB_tb_Mail_Documents d on u.ordernr = d.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT
